txt.en: '[placeholder], while you were out about your tasks, Falasgon sent word that another enemy encampment has been discovered near the Gostannon. You should speak at once with Dannaswen in our way-post atop Amon Angened above us to the north.'
'Yes, [placeholder], it is true... another Orc-camp has been discovered. I fear we have our work cut out for us.'
'Speak with Dannaswen at once, [placeholder]! She is at our way-post atop Amon Angened above us.'
'Yes, [placeholder], it is true...another Orc-camp has been discovered. I fear we have our work cut out for us.'
The presence of goblin-spies in the Mirk-eaves also infers the presence of multiple enemy encampments somewhere in the vicinity of the Mirk-eaves.
Talk to Dannaswen atop Amon Angened
Dannaswen is at Amon Angened, atop Amon Angened to the north, above Echad Mothelen.\n\nGlamod√∫d has asked you to speak with Dannaswen regarding the Orc-camp near the Gostannon in the north.
